result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
02:30 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Brian Thomas Smestad in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Nicholas R White appeared by video for Robert Joseph Biedler. Defendant Robert Joseph Biedler appeared by video, in custody from Polk County Jail. Court reviews case.  Atty White requests to quash warrant and addresses bond. ADA Smestad states received an Email from Polk CO Sergeant Johnson and reads email from Sergeant Johnson. Court does not quash warrant at this time. Court sets STC. Atty White to gather information re: incident in Polk Co. Adjourned 02:47 PM
Status conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Status conference on November 7, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Robert Joseph Biedler
Current: 1005 W Main St, Polk County Jail, Balsam Lake, WI 54810 United States  (Effective: 03-01-2022)
Prior: 2338 150Th St, Luck, WI 54853
Return on warrant on November 1, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant's Motion to Request a Return on Warrant Hearing. Filed by Atty. White. kma    

Objection by DA. Per EFV on 10/11/22, set hearing- DE may appear by Zoom from Polk Co Jail. JA scheduled with attys and provided Zoom info to Polk Co Jail. kma
for certified copy. Filed by Polk County Atty Webster. arc     Mailed with invoice on 10/06/22. arc

11:02 AM Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Unmonitored DAR, Clk: Yates. Attorney Nicholas R White in court for Robert Joseph Biedler.  Attorney Brian Thomas Smestad in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Robert Joseph Biedler not in court. Set for continued preliminary hearing. Atty White updates court re: DE whereabouts. Court notes presence of arresting officer. DA requests warrant. Court orders warrant body only, surrounding states. Adjourned: 11:04 a.m.
for Continuance of 7/26/22 Preliminary Hearing, signed by EFV 7/18/22.  gll

for continuance of 7/20 PH. Filed by ADA Smestad. km
Per TCH on 6-30-2022: continuance approved. ok to reschedule JA will reschedule. rg/km

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, R.H.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

- If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping. Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

1:39 PM  Attorney Karl Anderson in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Nicholas R White in court for Robert Joseph Biedler. Defendant Robert Joseph Biedler in court. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Defendant hired private counsel. Bond arguments. Court orders bond. Atty White states DE is still in treatment and will discharge 07/18/22. Court confirms address. DE updates phone number. Atty White waives prelim time limits. Court sets PH with Court Commissioner. Adjourned 01:45 PM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 20, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
Preliminary hearing on July 20, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
Per EFV. arc
Initial appearance on June 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

01:56 PM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. ADA: Brian Thomas Smestad, DF ATTY: Nicholas R White appeared via zoom, DF: Robert Joseph Biedler did not appear from Polk County Jail. Set fo INIT.Court notes DE was on Zoom but no longer there. Atty White states trying to quash warrant for DE to be transffered to Fahrman Center. Court Quashed Warrant. Court sets STC. Adjourned  Initial appearance scheduled for June 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
